name: jshint
description: Extension to lint JavaScript files using jshint.
author: Microsoft Corporation

jshint.enable.description: Control whether jshint is enabled for JavaScript files or not.

jshint.options.description: The jshint options object to provide args to the jshint command.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd ../jshint-server && npm run compile && cd ../jshint && node ./node_modules/vscode/bin/compile
